/*
 	C++ Template
	Gaurav Babbar
*/

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 505
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define gc getchar
#define pc putchar
#define ll long long
#define llu unsigned long long
#define fill(a, val) memset(a, val, sizeof(a))

ll ABS(ll a){if(a>0) return a; else return (-1*a);}
int gcd(int a,int b){if (b==0) return a;else return gcd(b,a%b);}
llu power(llu b,llu exp,llu m) {llu ans=1; b%=m; while(exp){if(exp&1) ans=(ans*b)%m; exp>>=1; b=(b*b)%m; } return ans; }
using namespace std;

#define DisplayDebuggingInfo 1
#define debug(args...) {dbg,args; if(DisplayDebuggingInfo) cerr<<endl;}
struct debugger
{
      template<typename T> debugger& operator,(const T& v)
      {
          if(DisplayDebuggingInfo)
          {
              cerr<< v <<" ";
              return *this;
          }
      }
}dbg;

inline void inp(ll &n)
{
  n = 0;
  int ch = gc();
  int sign = 1;
  while(ch < '0' || ch > '9') {
    if (ch == '-') sign = -1;
    ch = gc();
  }
  while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
    n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + ch - '0', ch = gc();
  n = n*sign;
}

inline void outp(llu a)
{
  char snum[25];
  int i=0;
  do
  {
    snum[i++]=a%10+48;
    a=a/10;
  } while(a!=0);
  i=i-1;
  while(i>=0)
    pc(snum[i--]);
  pc('\n');
}

/* Main Code sarts here */

ll W,N,p[MAX],w[MAX];

void reset()
{
    W = 0;
    N = 0;
    memset(&p,0,sizeof(p));
    memset(&w,0,sizeof(w));
}

void input()
{
   ll initialWeight,finalWeight;
   inp(initialWeight);inp(finalWeight);
   W = finalWeight - initialWeight;
   inp(N);
   for(int i=0;i<N;++i)
   {
       inp(p[i]);inp(w[i]);
   }
}

void preprocess()
{
}

void solve()
{
    ll* dp = new ll[W+2];
    dp[0] = 0;
    for(int i=1;i<=W;++i)
    {
        ll minValue = 9999999;
        for(int j=0;j<N;++j)
        {
            if(i>=w[j])
            {
                if(dp[i-w[j]]>0 || i==w[j])
                    minValue = min(minValue,p[j]+dp[i-w[j]]);
            }
        }
        dp[i] = (minValue==9999999)? 0 : minValue;
    }
    if(dp[W])
        cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<dp[W]<<"."<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
}

int main()
{
   ll t;
   inp(t);
   while(t--)
   {
	   reset();
	   input();
	   preprocess();
	   solve();
   }
   return 0;
}
